flawed_nl_solution:
There are 40 x 25% = <<40*25*0.01=10>>10 students who wear glasses.
There are 40 x 40% = <<40*40*0.01=16>>16 students who wear contact lenses.
There are 10 + 16 = <<10+16=31>>31 students who wear vision assistance.
There are 40 - 31 = <<40-31=9>>9 students who do not wear any vision assistance wear.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 26, not 31. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
